author: Nicky Robertson, CNN
title: Trump on USNS Comfort: 'If we need it for the virus, we'll use it for that'
description: President Donald Trump said Sunday night that the USNS Comfort, docked in New York, could be used for coronavirus patients if needed.
content:
(CNN)President Donald Trump said Sunday night that the USNS Comfort, docked in New York, could be used for coronavirus patients if needed. 
"That was not supposed to be for the virus at all and under circumstances. It looks like more and more we'll be using … [+1706 chars]
